code: var productInitState=[];var productsReducer=function productsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:productInitState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_PRODUCT':{return[].concat(action.payload);}case'UPDATE_PRODUCT':{return[].concat(action.payload);}case'EDIT_PRODUCT':{return state.map(function(product){if(product._id===action.payload._id){return Object.assign({},product,action.payload);}else{return Object.assign({},product);}});}default:{return[].concat(state);}}};export default productsReducer;
